metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4556 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The string-translate* procedure in the data-structures unit in CHICKEN before 4.10.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash).

notes.Note: sbeattie> will be fixed upstream in 4.10

criterions.comment: chicken: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
